mapper.select: SELECT ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET FROM WECHAT_QRCODE WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET FROM WECHAT_QRCODE WHERE SCENE_STR = #{sceneStr}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WECHAT_QRCODE U WHERE U.SCENE_STR = #{sceneStr} AND U.ID != #{id}
SELECT ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET FROM WECHAT_QRCODE

SELECT ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET FROM WECHAT_QRCODE
ORDER BY ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WECHAT_QRCODE (ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET) VALUES (#{id}, #{appId}, #{actionName}, #{sceneStr}, #{image}, #{remarks}, #{createId}, #{createName}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{type}, #{config}, #{ticket})

INSERT INTO WECHAT_QRCODE (ID, APP_ID, ACTION_NAME, SCENE_STR, IMAGE, REMARKS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CONFIG, TICKET) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.appId}, #{item.actionName}, #{item.sceneStr}, #{item.image}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.createId}, #{item.createName}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.type}, #{item.config}, #{ticket})
